meanings.definition: A person who inherits or is entitled to inherit property.
meanings.sent1: The heritors of the old mansion were excited to receive their inheritance.
meanings.sent2: The heritors of the estate divided the land among themselves.
meanings.sent3: The heritors of the treasure chest found a surprise note hidden inside.
meanings.sent4: The heritors of knowledge pass down wisdom like a precious heirloom.
meanings.sent5: The heritors of the ancient artifact felt a deep sense of responsibility.

meanings.definition: Those who receive or are entitled to receive a legacy from a deceased person.
meanings.sent1: The heritors of the will gathered to hear the lawyer's reading.
meanings.sent2: The heritors of the fortune were grateful for the unexpected windfall.
meanings.sent3: The heritors of the family heirlooms shared stories of their ancestors.
meanings.sent4: The heritors of the tradition carried on the customs with pride.
meanings.sent5: The heritors of the legacy honored the memory of their benefactor.
